name: nimbuscore
description: **NimbusCore** is the foundation of the **NimbusStack** ecosystem, designed to provide a robust and scalable cloud framework for modern JavaScript applications. It offers essential services such as **service discovery**, **configuration management**, **circuit breakers**, and **distributed logging** to enhance resilience in cloud-native environments.
author: Robin Goerlach <robin.goerlach@sasd.de> (https://sasd.de/)
